    Referral System Setup

    here are you will be able to setup Referral settings:

    • Configs
    • Page

    There are two types of referral system you can give users to earn from
    inventing users and make deposits.

    Number1: to disable and enable the referral system
    Number2: Enter the number of referral levels
    Number3: Click to generate

    you can customize the page of referral system
    that will be appeared to the users.
    for adding html content you can use HTML icon.
    if you pasted content from other site, you should use Remove Format icon
    to make it fixed with the site layout.
